title: Client extremely slow in these past couple of days
body:
My client has been really lagging ever since yesterday and I'm not sure why. It takes 2-3 minutes to log in and then another 2 minutes to "Confirm" a lobby type when I choose to play. All of the tabs load extremely slowly as well. I'm also getting .25-.50 second delays on all of my commands in-game. My ping and FPS have not changed at all everything else on my computer works perfectly fine (games included like CSGO). 
(I have a friend that has this exact same issue!)

How can I fix this?

replies.body: Your network might be having some issues with packet loss if you're seeing so much lagging and freezing. It can happen sometimes when your connection starts to loss bits of data before it hits our servers. Check out this [**log reader**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743) with some of your recent games' network logs, take a screenshot of what it spits out and post it here for me to go over with you.

That little bit of packet loss might have something to do with it, but with it being that low it's hard to be sure. I'd like to have you go ahead and run through our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to cover your bases, so make sure to go through each step there, paying close attention to port forwarding and flushing your DNS. Let me know how that goes!

https://gyazo.com/52287e05cf7c88f0400d35ad7869d230

https://gyazo.com/2521bdbebdeb21654a4ce9e8b7ff9187

https://gyazo.com/35c7d5b6fe882d17a4abe606807f9ea3

All of them say ping issue but I live in Hong Kong and I've always had a 215 ping constant without lag problems until a few days ago.

The client itself is also extremely unresponsive and I'm still facing the problem where creating/joining lobbies takes 1-2 minutes.
